name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Live Code Preview for You.com and ChatGPT

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instantly preview HTML and Mermaid code on You.com and ChatGPT.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension allows you to instantly preview HTML code and Mermaid diagrams directly on You.com and ChatGPT. It automatically detects code snippets within the webpage content and renders them visually without the need for external tools.
